title: [Large-Scale] Sustainability Education Design Utilizing Digital Data Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic data analysis and visualization tools, general understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: A project-based learning course for non-degree-seeking adult learners, delivering data-driven sustainability messaging in digital environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the process of deriving insights by collecting and analyzing sustainability-related data.
Learners will be able to create data-driven storytelling content using digital tools (charts, infographics, videos).
Learners will be able to design data storytelling strategies tailored to specific audiences (e.g., businesses, local governments, the general public) and produce presentation materials.

resources: Open Data Platform (Sustainable Development Goals Dataset)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
